title: Motivational and Learning Strategies Workshop for Virtual Education Design

context.additional_context: Course addressing the need for practical skill enhancement following the pandemic-driven shift to virtual education, where learners design virtual training projects integrating theory and practice

learning_goals: Participants can present strategies to enhance learning engagement by 30% or more by applying ARCS motivation theory to virtual instructional design
Learners design e-learning modules for language acquisition using Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Participants develop virtual education projects using PBL methodologies and submit assignments with at least 80% completion quality verified through peer assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
